Yup, I agree. Would love to see the annual prices with discounts on it.

Also, what is the clause on CPU usage? Is there a threshold that you enforce or it is fully available?

We keep an eye on CPU use and if it's legitimate and above-board (i.e. nothing criminal or shady) and in line with our TOS you can use as much as you want.
